svg.text:
title: "Week in Ethereum News
June 17, 2023" date: "2023-06-17"
Eth News and Links
Dencun (Cancun + Deneb) upgrade
* Latest all core devs – consensus (ACDC) call video . Notes from Christine Kim : Deneb
scope: EIP7044 (perpetually valid signed voluntary exits) & EIP4788 (beacon root in
EVM); considered for inclusion: EIP7045 (increase max attestation inclusion slot) &
EIP6988 (prevent slashed validator being elected block proposer) Discussion on reorgs
increasing and proposal to change sub-slot timing for block production, attestation &
aggregation Discussion on staking with more than 32 ETH per validator
Latest all core devs – consensus (ACDC) call video . Notes from Christine Kim :
* Deneb scope: EIP7044 (perpetually valid signed voluntary exits) & EIP4788 (beacon
root in EVM); considered for inclusion: EIP7045 (increase max attestation inclusion
slot) & EIP6988 (prevent slashed validator being elected block proposer)
Deneb scope: EIP7044 (perpetually valid signed voluntary exits) & EIP4788 (beacon root
in EVM); considered for inclusion: EIP7045 (increase max attestation inclusion slot) &
EIP6988 (prevent slashed validator being elected block proposer)
* Discussion on reorgs increasing and proposal to change sub-slot timing for block
production, attestation & aggregation
Discussion on reorgs increasing and proposal to change sub-slot timing for block
* Discussion on staking with more than 32 ETH per validator
Discussion on staking with more than 32 ETH per validator
* EIP4844: Latest EIP4844 implementer call video . Notes from Terence Dankrad’s
additional testing to size blobs per block EIP4844 devnet 6 launched KZG ceremony has
over 110k contributions, lobby is empty
* Latest EIP4844 implementer call video . Notes from Terence
Latest EIP4844 implementer call video . Notes from Terence
* Dankrad’s additional testing to size blobs per block
Dankrad’s additional testing to size blobs per block
* EIP4844 devnet 6 launched
EIP4844 devnet 6 launched
* KZG ceremony has over 110k contributions, lobby is empty
KZG ceremony has over 110k contributions, lobby is empty
* Consensus-specs v1.4.0-alpha.3 : patch to increase BLOB_SIDECAR_SUBNET_COUNT to 6
Consensus-specs v1.4.0-alpha.3 : patch to increase BLOB_SIDECAR_SUBNET_COUNT to 6
Layer 1
* Erigon archive node running on $500 hardware
Erigon archive node running on $500 hardware
* Dedaub: EIP6404/6466 SSZ transition impact on contracts using RLP [Reminder: SSZ EIPs
were already removed from Dencun upgrade]
Dedaub: EIP6404/6466 SSZ transition impact on contracts using RLP [Reminder: SSZ EIPs
* Beacon API checker : CLI to check API responses across clients, in Rust
Beacon API checker : CLI to check API responses across clients, in Rust
Client releases
* Consensus layer: Prysm v4.0.6 : bug fixes & optimizations to shorten block proposal
time for edge cases Teku v23.6.0 : rewards beacon-api endpoints & how Teku fixed its
May non-finality issue
Consensus layer:
* Prysm v4.0.6 : bug fixes & optimizations to shorten block proposal time for edge
cases
Prysm v4.0.6 : bug fixes & optimizations to shorten block proposal time for edge cases
* Teku v23.6.0 : rewards beacon-api endpoints & how Teku fixed its May non-finality
issue
Teku v23.6.0 : rewards beacon-api endpoints & how Teku fixed its May non-finality issue
* Execution layer: Erigon v2.45.2 : staged sync fix
Execution layer:
* Erigon v2.45.2 : staged sync fix
For Stakers
* Payload’s block analytics dashboard , beta
Research
* Data visualization on May loss of finality incident
Layer 2
* Optimistic Erigon client supports Optimism mainnet
Optimistic Erigon client supports Optimism mainnet
* Arbitrum sequencer batch posting post-mortem
Arbitrum sequencer batch posting post-mortem
* Layer 2 MEV and decentralizing sequencing
Layer 2 MEV and decentralizing sequencing
* Frax Finance plans Fraxchain rollup using its LSD as the gas fee token
Frax Finance plans Fraxchain rollup using its LSD as the gas fee token
EIPs/Standards
* ERCs: ERC7169 : Tranche sequence ERC7182 : Interface naming conventions:
* ERC7169 : Tranche sequence
ERC7169 : Tranche sequence
* ERC7182 : Interface naming conventions:
ERC7182 : Interface naming conventions:
Stuff for developers
* Foundry: Pre-v1 updates : fuzz-runs CLI flag, 0 basefee, batch transactions on
Optimism and readCallers cheatcode Fuzzy DeFi : code properties for Uniswap v2, Olympus
DAO & Compound v2 forks Forge-safe : build Safe multisig batch transactions using Forge
scripting
Foundry:
* Pre-v1 updates : fuzz-runs CLI flag, 0 basefee, batch transactions on Optimism and
readCallers cheatcode
Pre-v1 updates : fuzz-runs CLI flag, 0 basefee, batch transactions on Optimism and
* Fuzzy DeFi : code properties for Uniswap v2, Olympus DAO & Compound v2 forks
Fuzzy DeFi : code properties for Uniswap v2, Olympus DAO & Compound v2 forks
* Forge-safe : build Safe multisig batch transactions using Forge scripting
Forge-safe : build Safe multisig batch transactions using Forge scripting
* OpenZeppelin Contracts v4.9.2 : MerkleProof library patch, potential issue in
multiproof leaf validation
OpenZeppelin Contracts v4.9.2 : MerkleProof library patch, potential issue in
* Uniswap v4 : customize liquidity pools using hooks, flash accounting using ERC1153
(transient storage) in Dencun upgrade, work in progress, 4 year business source license
V4-template : template for creating Uniswap v4 hooks Huff hooks : Uniswap v4 hooks
library in Huff, work in progress
Uniswap v4 : customize liquidity pools using hooks, flash accounting using ERC1153
* V4-template : template for creating Uniswap v4 hooks
V4-template : template for creating Uniswap v4 hooks
* Huff hooks : Uniswap v4 hooks library in Huff, work in progress
Huff hooks : Uniswap v4 hooks library in Huff, work in progress
* Bytecode.zip : deploy zipped & wrapper contracts from the browser
Bytecode.zip : deploy zipped & wrapper contracts from the browser
* Titanoboa (Vyper interpreter) jupyter notebooks integration : sign via browser
Titanoboa (Vyper interpreter) jupyter notebooks integration : sign via browser
* Ethers.js ENS multicoin provider plugin
Ethers.js ENS multicoin provider plugin
* ABIType : adds conversion from JSON ABIs to human-readable ABIs at runtime &
type-level
ABIType : adds conversion from JSON ABIs to human-readable ABIs at runtime & type-level
* RainbowKit v1.0.2 : adds WalletConnect v2 support
RainbowKit v1.0.2 : adds WalletConnect v2 support
* 4byte collider : script to find function signatures with colliding 4byte selectors
4byte collider : script to find function signatures with colliding 4byte selectors
* Wallet Test Framework : switched to viem and added more tests
Wallet Test Framework : switched to viem and added more tests
* Passkey based Account Abstraction signer for contract wallets
Passkey based Account Abstraction signer for contract wallets
Security
* Sturdy Finance, $800k exploit , price manipulation via read-only reentrancy
Sturdy Finance, $800k exploit , price manipulation via read-only reentrancy
* Signature malleability : proof of concept showing attack using compact signatures
Signature malleability : proof of concept showing attack using compact signatures
Ecosystem
* Holešky testnet (Goerli successor) genesis planned for September 15 (Merge day) with
1.5 million validators, majority run by client teams
Holešky testnet (Goerli successor) genesis planned for September 15 (Merge day) with
* EF Q1 grantees share $13 million in funding
EF Q1 grantees share $13 million in funding
* ETHPrague hackathon winners & videos
ETHPrague hackathon winners & videos
Enterprise
* BOCI (Bank of China) issued CNH 200 million ($28M) in tokenized notes
Notable at app layer
* Maker Dai Savings Rate (DSR) increases to 3.49% on June 19
Maker Dai Savings Rate (DSR) increases to 3.49% on June 19
* Uniswap v4 vision : more generalized v3 allowing different tradeoffs via hooks for
customized pools
Uniswap v4 vision : more generalized v3 allowing different tradeoffs via hooks for
* Uniswap Foundation bridge assessment
Uniswap Foundation bridge assessment
* EigenLayer stage 1 live on mainnet, reached guarded launch limits; restaking
dashboard
EigenLayer stage 1 live on mainnet, reached guarded launch limits; restaking dashboard
* Sound (music NFTs) live on Optimism
Sound (music NFTs) live on Optimism
* The Goose NFT sold for $5.4 million from 3AC collection
The Goose NFT sold for $5.4 million from 3AC collection
* Rough sailing lately for NFT infra projects: JPG pausing and NFF (Backed) winding
down
Rough sailing lately for NFT infra projects: JPG pausing and NFF (Backed) winding down
Job Listings
* Protocol Engineer (DeFi) sought by Tunnel Vision Labs
Protocol Engineer (DeFi) sought by Tunnel Vision Labs
* Devconnect Istanbul: Production Assistant and Volunteer Coordinator
Devconnect Istanbul: Production Assistant and Volunteer Coordinator
* Solidity team need a highly skilled Developer Advocate
Solidity team need a highly skilled Developer Advocate
Job listings: $600 for four issues (75 character limit), payable to abcoathup.eth.
Questions? abcoathup at-gmail
Regulation/business/tokens
* US SEC: Extremely strange circumstances surrounding “compliant” Prometheum Blockchain
Association FOIA request for communications about SEC’s suspicious approval Hinman docs
on 2018 speech that Ether is not a security Mark Cuban eviscerates former SEC staffer
US SEC:
* Extremely strange circumstances surrounding “compliant” Prometheum
Extremely strange circumstances surrounding “compliant” Prometheum
* Blockchain Association FOIA request for communications about SEC’s suspicious
approval
Blockchain Association FOIA request for communications about SEC’s suspicious approval
* Hinman docs on 2018 speech that Ether is not a security
Hinman docs on 2018 speech that Ether is not a security
* Mark Cuban eviscerates former SEC staffer
Mark Cuban eviscerates former SEC staffer
* Coindesk: Tether heavily backed by Chinese commercial paper
Coindesk: Tether heavily backed by Chinese commercial paper
* BlackRock filed for spot Bitcoin ETF
BlackRock filed for spot Bitcoin ETF
* FT: Hong Kong regulator pushing banks to accept more crypto exchanges as clients
FT: Hong Kong regulator pushing banks to accept more crypto exchanges as clients
* Wyre winding down
Wyre winding down
General/crypto
* Video-based cryptanalysis : key recovered from smartcard by analyzing video of power
LED
Video-based cryptanalysis : key recovered from smartcard by analyzing video of power
* Zeromorph : speed ups to make Plonk performant
Zeromorph : speed ups to make Plonk performant
* ZachXBT sued by MachiBigBrother (Jeffrey Huang) for defamation, donate:
zachxbtlegalfund.eth
ZachXBT sued by MachiBigBrother (Jeffrey Huang) for defamation, donate:
Follow @WeekinEthNews to find out what the most clicked links are. Follow @abcoathup
and @evan_van_ness to get most of the week’s news in real time.
Permalink for this week’s issue:
https://weekinethereumnews.com/week-in-ethereum-news-june-17-2023
Upcoming Dates of Note
(new/changes in bold )
* Jun 18 – Ethereum Protocol Fellowship cohort four application deadline extended
Jun 18 – Ethereum Protocol Fellowship cohort four application deadline extended
* Jun 20 – EF run a node grant deadline
Jun 20 – EF run a node grant deadline
* Jun 22–25 – Pragma Waterloo & ETHGlobal Waterloo hackathon
Jun 22–25 – Pragma Waterloo & ETHGlobal Waterloo hackathon
* Jun 26 – Jul 17 – CLRFund round 9
Jun 26 – Jul 17 – CLRFund round 9
* Jul 5-9 – ETHBarcelona conference & hackathon
Jul 5-9 – ETHBarcelona conference & hackathon
* Jul 17-20 – EthCC (Paris)

Jul 21–23 – ETHGlobal Paris

Sep 15 – Protocol Berg (Berlin)

Sep 18-21 – ETH Montréal conference & hackathon

Sep 22–24 – ETHGlobal New York
* Oct 5-6 – ETHMilan conference
Oct 5-6 – ETHMilan conference

Oct 6-8 – ETHRome hackathon
* Oct 6–27 – ETHOnline (ETHGlobal) virtual
Oct 6–27 – ETHOnline (ETHGlobal) virtual
* Oct 27–29 – ETH Miami festival & hackathon
Oct 27–29 – ETH Miami festival & hackathon

Nov 3-5 – ETH Lisbon hackathon

Nov 3-5 – ETHBrno
